abstract: Iranian news media is spotlighting division between Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu and Pres Obama over how to deal with country's nuclear program as proof that Israel is being isolated by its ally United States; analysts are pondering how split might affect results of nuclear negotiations; many Iranians hope American public opinion will turn against Netanyahu as result of speech to Congress.
lead_paragraph: Many in Iran hope that a blunt speech to Congress by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel would turn American public opinion against him.

headline.main: Netanyahu Speech Has Eager Audience in Iran
headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Speech Has Eager Audience in Iran

snippet: Many in Iran hope that a blunt speech to Congress by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel would turn American public opinion against him.
